name: Van Borg Limited
description: London-based digital marketing agency specialising in Local SEO, Google Ads lead generation, SEO-optimised websites and AI chatbots for service-based businesses across the UK.
industry: Digital Marketing, Local SEO, Google Ads, AI Automation

contact.businessHours: Monday–Friday: 8:00 AM – 9:00 PM; Saturday: 9:00 AM – 8:00 PM; Sunday: 10:30 AM – 5:00 PM (UK time)

services.name: Local SEO & Google Business Profile Ranking
services.description: Local SEO and Google Business Profile optimisation to rank service businesses in the top 5 on Google Maps and local search for high-intent, money keywords.
services.roi: Significant uplift in local visibility and qualified enquiries over 3–6 months
features: Google Business Profile setup, cleanup and optimisation
Local SEO strategy for key services and locations
Citation building and NAP consistency
Review acquisition strategy and templates
Competitor analysis against top-ranking businesses
Ongoing ranking checks and optimisation

services.name: Google Ads – Lead Generation Campaigns
services.description: High-intent Google Ads campaigns designed to generate qualified local leads with clear, measurable ROI for service-based businesses.
services.price: From £1,000 one-time setup + From £750/month retainer + 10-20% of ad spend (performance fee)
services.roi: Many clients see around 3x–5x return on ad spend after initial optimisation period
features: Keyword research focused on ready-to-buy searches
Search campaigns structured for local intent
Compelling ad copy that filters out time-wasters
Conversion tracking for calls, forms and enquiries
Ongoing bid, keyword and negative keyword optimisation
Transparent reporting and scaling recommendations

services.name: AI Chatbots & Lead Automations
services.description: Custom AI chatbots that capture, qualify and route leads 24/7, integrated into your website and key communication channels.
services.roi: More leads captured outside office hours and less time spent on repetitive enquiries
features: Voiceflow-based AI chatbots tailored to your niche
24/7 FAQ handling and service explanations
Lead capture and qualification workflows
Appointment or call-back handover flows
Integration with website and messaging channels
Ongoing refinement based on real conversations

services.name: SEO-Optimised, Conversion-Focused Websites
services.description: Fast, mobile-first websites engineered with React and Tailwind, built to rank on Google and convert visitors into leads and customers.
services.price: From £2,500 one-time build + From £200/month retainer for hosting and SEO support
services.roi: Higher-quality traffic and improved conversion rates from organic and paid campaigns
features: React + TypeScript + Tailwind front-end stack
Mobile-first, conversion-focused layouts
On-page SEO structure (H1/H2, metadata, schema)
Core Web Vitals and performance optimisation
Clear call-to-actions for calls, forms and chat
Service, location and FAQ pages built for search

technologies: Cloud services (Firebase, Supabase, AWS basic integrations)

targetMarket.geographic: United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland)
industries: Any service-based local business relying on Google for leads

valueProposition: We help UK service businesses show up where buyers are looking, turn that attention into qualified leads, and use AI + automation so you don't waste them.
guarantees: Free consultation and strategy session before any commitment
Clear, honest explanations of what is and isn't realistic
Focus on measurable results: rankings, leads, enquiries and booked work
No fluff, no vanity metrics – just performance
certifications: Experience with Google Ads and Google Analytics implementations

typicalClientResults.localVisibilityIncrease: Stronger presence in Google Maps and local search for core service keywords
typicalClientResults.leadQualityImprovement: More qualified enquiries and fewer time-wasters from paid and organic traffic
typicalClientResults.conversionRateIncrease: Higher percentage of visitors turning into calls, form submissions or bookings
typicalClientResults.efficiencyGains: Less manual follow-up due to AI chatbots and automated workflows
